mapper.insert:
SELECT replace(uuid(), '-', '')
SELECT replace(lower(newid()), '-', '')
SELECT replace(lower(sys_guid()), '-', '') from dual
insert into dev_reader (id,reader_no,name,type,reader_group,address,connect_type,ip,sn_no,dev_mode,firmware,is_online,is_time_sync,align_method,blacklight_time,voiceprompt,menu_time,wengenform,wengen_output,wengen_out_area,regfinger_out_time,authfinger_out_time,wg_order,relay_time,fixed_value,alarm_enable,open_enable,door_state,relay_enable,doorbell_enable,wifi_ssid,wifi_psw) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},#{readerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{readerGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{connectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{snNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{devMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{firmware,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isOnline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isTimeSync,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{alignMethod,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{blacklightTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{voiceprompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{menuTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wengenform,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wengenOutput,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wengenOutArea,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{regfingerOutTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{authfingerOutTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wgOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{relayTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{fixedValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{alarmEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{openEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{doorState,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{relayEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{doorbellEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{wifiSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wifiPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update dev_reader set reader_no = #{readerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reader_group = #{readerGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connect_type = #{connectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn_no = #{snNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dev_mode = #{devMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firmware = #{firmware,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_online = #{isOnline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_time_sync = #{isTimeSync,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, align_method = #{alignMethod,jdbcType=TINYINT}, blacklight_time = #{blacklightTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, voiceprompt = #{voiceprompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_time = #{menuTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wengenform = #{wengenform,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wengen_output = #{wengenOutput,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wengen_out_area = #{wengenOutArea,jdbcType=TINYINT}, regfinger_out_time = #{regfingerOutTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, authfinger_out_time = #{authfingerOutTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wg_order = #{wgOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, relay_time = #{relayTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fixed_value = #{fixedValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_enable = #{alarmEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, open_enable = #{openEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, door_state = #{doorState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, relay_enable = #{relayEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, doorbell_enable = #{doorbellEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wifi_ssid = #{wifiSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wifi_psw = #{wifiPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
